forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 7C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 1C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 35F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 40F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High around 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with afternoon snow showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow showers developing in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 3C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later in the day. High 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers that will mix with rain showers later. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 34F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
